titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel WOLF GANG II.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E947)

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.4820.

bill.summary: 5/17/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade for a named vessel.
